snippet: Fondly remembered by many who saw bands perform there from 1970 through 1976, the Capitol officially reopened as a rock hall on Tuesday night with a Bob Dylan concert.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by Bob Dylan at the Capitol Theater in Port Chester, NY.
lead_paragraph: Fondly remembered by many who saw bands perform there from 1970 through 1976, the Capitol officially reopened as a rock hall on Tuesday night with a Bob Dylan concert.

headline.seo: Bob Dylan at the Capitol Theater in Port Chester, N.Y.
headline.main: A Jovial Dylan Celebrates Reopening of Capitol Theater
headline.print_headline: How Does It Feel to Update the Lyrics?
